title: 2 Espressos
original_name: トゥー・エスプレッソ
sinopse: Benjamin, 42, author of comics, goes in search of an unknown Asian woman with whom he shared, seventeen years ago, a night of his life. His quest leads him to Michihiko, a café boss with a very little talent for coffee, but very nice personality, with whom he soon enters into a friendly relationship.
